title: Chicken and black bean sauce with bok choi
description: Heat up the wok for a delicious dinner for two with stir-fried strips of chicken, spicy black bean sauce, greens and egg-fried rice.
ingredients: 2 boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into slices 1cm/½in thick
3 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine (or dry sherry)
10cm/5in piece fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped
